summary: A Marine Biologist is assigned to investigate the mysterious deaths of marine life in an inland salt water lake that have been attributed to a creature thought to have been the stuff of legend.
cast: Britt Griffith|Alexis Iacono|JW Wiseman|Devanny Pinn|Brandon Slagle|James Duval|Chanel Ryan|Candace Kita|Jennifer Woods|Dillon Paigen|Tawny Amber Young|Frederic Doss|K.J. McCormick|Jim Mitchell|Teresa R. Parker|Ryan Kiser|Mel Turner|J.T. Griffith|Zane Balogh|Adrian Quihuis|David Dossett|Jonathan Williams|Rileigh Griffith|Tyler Griffith|Holly Griffith|Richard Hollien|Paul Amoy|Tyler Amoy|Chris Denton|Benjamin Hulstrand|Hayden Kalianov|Rick Lowe|Joseph Rizzo|Jake Strader|Adam Zapata|Clint Barta|Cody Barta|AJ Perez|Dave Tackett|Tyler Cheman|Lori Cholewka|Lynn Czekaj|Sherri Lyn Litz|Mark Mendola|Chase Moyer|Isabelle Moyer|Norman Queeno|Dean Stock|Darrin Stock|Brandyn T. Williams|Barbara Fairchild|Ninibeth Garcia|Yaritza Garcia|Lynda O'Hagan|Don O'Hagan|Joanna Ruiz|Dan Moyer|Brenda Rickert|Erin Rigwalski
title: Dead Sea
